title: A INDUSTRYA - Voxidated Equipament (2007)
description:
A INDUSTRYA - Voxidated Equipament (2007)

Real Name: Valter Sangregorio 
www.aindustrya.com
myspace aindustria 
Name Variations: A Industrya | Aindustrya  

An outfit formed in the year of 1999 by Valter Sangregorio. It came out of a remix for a Frontrunner song, Machine Age, then infinite experimentation possibilities were born. Feeling at home with the most distorted sounds, then came the idea of creating more music, where the proposal is getting the closest possible to a machine-like sound. Hence the outfit name. Thus releasing complex and experimental music with frequent rhythmic variations, movie samples, dark basslines, deep ambiences created by keyboards, diverse noises are constant elements. Creating an unlimited sound trying to get away from the tedious repetition of some genres. Adding elements of EBM/Industrial/Noise and even softer styles such as synth pop and ambient. We reached an unique and unlabelled sound named: A Industrya 

Label: Metropolis Project Recs.  
Country: Brazil 
Released: 2007
Genre: Electronic  
Style: EBM, Techno, Experimental, Industrial Noise
Quality: MP3 128 kbps
